name: RecommendationsRelatedToMedicationRegimenChangeMedicationCourse
title: Recommendations Related to Medication Regimen, Change Medication Course
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes that represent an instance where a provider recommends to a prescriber or provider in modify a medication course, or length of time the patient will be on the therapy, within a prescribed regimen.),(Data Element Scope: Datatype: Intervention

The intent of this data element is to document a drug therapy recommendation to modify a medication course within a prescribed treatment regimen.),(Inclusion Criteria: Codes that represent a recommendation to modify the course of a medication or therapy.),(Exclusion Criteria: Any codes that represent an explicit action has taken place or other codes for recommendations that are not specifically for changing a medication course.)
